ygData.subject: In the Bridge Again?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Rex turns his head as he hears someone walk up, nearly jumping up as he sees Battera at the doorway. Are you crazy? he asks her, standing up and walking

::Rex::

Rex turns his head as he hears someone walk up, nearly jumping up as he sees 
Battera at the doorway.

"Are you crazy?" he asks her, standing up and walking toward her, "Nearly 
getting slagged by me wasn't enough? If Firearm sees you, you'll be dead 
before you can blink!"
